shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” (fols. 3ra-136vb) I-1) ʾƎsäggǝd lä-mäläkotǝkä... “I worship Thy Godhead…” (fols. 3ra-5va) I-2) Introduction - A hymn to Jesus Christ (fols. 5va-6ra) - Story of the family of Adam (fols. 6ra-10rb) - On John the Evangelist as the author of the book; on the creation and the fall of the angels (fols. 10rb-12vb) I-3) Täʾamrä ʾIyäsus “Miracles of Jesus”: 89 miracles (fols. 12vb-136vb)
Additio 1.

txstates.txstate: The Ms. was rebound and resewn with modern synthetic threads. The Ms. is stained with wax. Tears are carefully amended on fols. 7, 41, 56, 74, 96, 123; the text is damaged on fols. 33rb, 85v, 86r, 87r (partly illegible); fol. 97 consists of two sheets (one main and the other additional) of parchment stitched together

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish tooled leather; textile and leather inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish leather cover (at least five tools were used: criss-cross, double circle, triple line fillet, double crescent with eye, interlaced line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(2; fols. 1r-2v) - [፩]I(8;fols. 3r-10v) - ፪II(8; fols. 11r-18v) - ፫III(8; fols. 19r-26v) - [፬]IV(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 27r-34v) - ፭V(8; fols. 35r-42v) - ፮VI(8; fols. 43r-50v) - ፯VII(8; fols. 51r-58v) - [፰]VIII(8; fols. 59r-66v) - [፱]IX(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 7, stub after 3/fols. 67r-76v) - X(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 77r-84v) - [፲፩]XI(8; fols. 85r-92v) - [፲]፪XII(8; fols. 93r-100v) - [፲]፫XIII(8; fols. 101r-108v) - [፲]፬XIV(8; fols. 109r-116v) - ፲፭XV(8; fols. 117r-124v) - ፲፮XVI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2; fols. 125r-132v) - ፲፯XVII(6; fols. 133r-138v)

taunit.mr-info: All data for fol. 27r. The sizes of the margins slightly vary throughout the Ms.
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The size of the script significantly varies throughout the Ms.: cp. fols. in the beginning of the Ms., fols. 33r and 33v, 58v and 59r, 76v and 77r, esp. 124r.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; incipit of the miracles; four groups of lines on the incipit page of the Text I-1 (fol. 3a) alternating with black lines; the words ʾǝsäggǝd lä-mäläkotǝkä (or the word ʾǝsäggǝd only) in Text I-1; incipit of the verses in the Text I-2; miralcle numbers in Text I-3; incipit of the sections in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; two lines in the middle of fol. 10va

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓ፡ ዓለ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ (fol. 8vb) አሜ፡ for አሜን፡ (fol. 16va) አ፡ for አሜን፡ (fols. 55rb, 84vb)

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Sections of Text I-2 have been treated as miracles and given numbers 1-6. Thus, the 1st miracle proper bears number 7 (fol. 12vb) - The miracles are introduced with words täʾamǝr “miracle” and with mǝʿǝraf “chapter”.

additional.cont: Fol. 137va: Recent, hardly visible note.
additional.det: Probably written in a pencil. Some personal names can be discerned: Gäbrä Bahta, Gärä Mädhǝn, etc.

extras.extra: - Scribbles and doodles: fol. 1v, 2r, 2v, 19v, 20r, 81v, 89r, 130v, 131v, 136v, 137r, 138r - Omitted letters or words written interlineally in the main hand: fols. 15rb, 19rb, 23ra, 23rb, 25rb etc. - Erasures marked with thin lines: fol. 96rb - Spaces for donor name are left unfilled in the supplication formulas starting from fol. 74vb to fol. 76vb, on fols. 83va, 85rb, 88va, 91rb, 92rb, 93va, 94ra, 96rab, 99ra, 105ra, fol. 107va, 109va, 110vab, 112ra, 114rb, 115rb, 116va, 117rb, 119va, 120va, , 124vb, 128ra, 129rb, 130rb, 130vb, 131vb, 133rb, 134rb.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: Undecorated quire marks are written in the inner margin, close to the second written line, on the initial fol. of each quire: fols. 3r: [፩], 11r: ፪, 19r: ፫, 27r: [፬], 35r: ፭, 43r: ፮, 59r: [፰], 67r: [፱], 85r: [፲፩], 93r: [፲]፪, 101r: [፲]፫, 109r: [፲]፬, 117r: ፲፭, 125r: ፲፮, 133r: ፲፯.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Titles of miracles (or a part of it) or feasts indicating respective readings are sometimes written in the upper margin in a secondary (recent) hand: ዘልደት: fol. 14v ዘስመኦን: fol. 34r ጥምቀት፡ ጥር፡ ጥምቀት: fol. 36r ዘቃና፡ ዘገሊላ፡ ጥር፡ ቃና፡ ዘገሊላ፡ fol. 39v ዘጻድቃን፡ fol. 47r ሆሳእና፡ fol. 49r, ሆሣና፡ fol. 49v ዘሐሙስ፡ ጽግቦ፡ ለአምር (?)፡ fol. 53v ዘትንሳኤ፡ fol. 61v ዘዕርገት፡ fol. 64v ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት fol. 96r
